meanings.definition: Jubhahs (noun): plural form of jubhah, referring to a type of head covering worn by some Muslim women.
meanings.sent1: The jubhahs were beautifully embroidered with colorful threads.
meanings.sent2: She wore her jubhahs to the mosque every Friday.
meanings.sent3: The jubhahs fluttered in the gentle breeze as she walked.
meanings.sent4: Her jubhahs shielded her face from the scorching sun like a protective canopy.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the jubhahs made it a cherished family heirloom.

meanings.definition: Jubhahs (verb): third person singular present form of jubhah, meaning to wear a jubhah.
meanings.sent1: She jubhahs her traditional head covering with pride.
meanings.sent2: He jubhahs his jubhah every day without fail.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to jubhahs the hat, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: The clouds jubhahs the sky, creating a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The actor jubhahs the costume of the character flawlessly.

meanings.definition: Jubhahs (adjective): describing something related to or characteristic of jubhahs.
meanings.sent1: The jubhahs fabric was soft and breathable.
meanings.sent2: She admired the jubhahs patterns on the scarves.
meanings.sent3: The jubhahs style was a blend of tradition and modernity.
meanings.sent4: His jubhahs collection was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent5: The jubhahs influence could be seen in the local fashion trends.
